data.name: Conqueror's Blade - Soaring Sapphire Collector's Pack
data.detailed_description:
Soar high in victory. Take flight with the shimmering Blue Swan Hero Attire, a 30-day Premium Account, Silver, and siege weapons!

The Soaring Sapphire Collector's Pack contains:

Blue Swan Hero Attire: This deep blue garment belongs to a regiment of elite assassins, whose expert training and singular focus sealed the fates of any bandit warlords who dared to plague Liangyun.
30-Day Premium Account: Earn experience faster, and unlock other unique privileges!
50,000 Silver: Fund your conquests with a massive treasure trove of Silver.
1x Optimal Cannon: Blow the enemy's gates and defences asunder.
1x Optimal Culverin: Launch your offensive with this formidable siege engine.
1x Optimal Grapeshot Cannon: Aim and fire for maximum coverage.

IMPORTANT: Many items, including Premium time and Hero, Unit, and Horse Attire will be permanently bound to a single character when used. These items will be deposited in a special web inventory, from which they can be transferred to active characters. Once transferred, the item cannot be used by another character or account. If you delete a character to which you have transferred an item, that item will be lost.

To assign your new items to your characters in Conqueror’s Blade, head over to your web inventory and sign in with your Conqueror’s Blade account! You can also check out a full guide to the transfer process here.

data.short_description: Soar high in victory. Take flight with the shimmering Blue Swan Hero Attire, a 30-day Premium Account, 50,000 Silver, and 3 siege weapons!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Turkish, Polish, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 2GB / AMD HD 5870 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel i7-6700 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / AMD R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 55 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system.
